subject: Re: [junit] Re: Code Reuse and Modify
msgSnippet: By wizard , you mean the UI for running JUnit tests that comes with Eclipse? David Saff
messageBody:
By "wizard", you mean the UI for running JUnit tests that comes with Eclipse?

David Saff
